plugins.name: snake_case layer_name
plugins.description:
Make your layer name to snake_case


If snake_case is the best format for your layer naming and you have problem with that, then your suffering will be ended today.


Just select the layer you want to make it as snake_case, then run the plugin from the plugin menu or hit command + "/" then search the plugin name.


Enjoy,

Banyu Rachman

accepted.name: Banyu Rachman
accepted.description: UX Engineer. Part of Blibli Design.

plugins.name: LZ Rename All Frames
plugins.description:
Figma Plugin that helps you rename all frames in your file with a custom name and adds an increment counter to each frame.


With this you give a name to be used for reaming and it simply names your layers with the inputed name and ads a number.


eg If Name is given as Authentication the file names will be Authentication 1, Authentication 2 etc


How to use

  1. Run plugin
  2. Enter frame name ( optional )
  3. Click rename

accepted.name: Ogar Emmanuel
accepted.description:
UI UX designer at night, print designer during the day.
Follow me on instagram if you got questions or need more of my designs

plugins.tagline: Custom rename layers

plugins.name: HIVO
plugins.description:
HIVO is a digital asset management platform that is on a mission to unite technology, teams and data across multiple businesses to all work together in a collaborative and secure cloud environment.


Thousands of brand managers, creatives, IT professionals, developers, engineers and marketers use HIVO every day to create, review, download, approve, share and store digital content. HIVO differentiates itself from competitors by focusing on developing easy to learn and use, design-led and automated user experiences.


Whether you're sharing content with external agencies, creating a video for social media, writing the brief for a press release, viewing a branded style guide, reviewing a website mockup, requesting approval from a colleague, or starting an automated marketing campaign - it can all be done within the one platform, HIVO.


HIVO differentiates itself from competitors by focusing on developing easy to learn and use, design-led and automated user experiences.


Teams that use HIVO:

  • Improve communication amongst your team and partners;
  • Unlock user collaborations and transparency;
  • Build better emotional connections with customers, partners and stakeholders;
  • Increase the volume and improve the quality of visual communications;
  • Achieve end-to-end brand consistency across all marketing channels and regions;
  • Achieve cost savings on ownership of digital assets; and
  • Capture data and report on user activity and digital asset use.
plugins.tagline: HIVO is a digital asset management (DAM) platform in a secured cloud environment.

HIVO differentiates itself from competitors by focusing on developing easy to learn and use, design-led and automated user experiences.


Whether you're sharing content with external agencies, creating a video for social media, writing the brief for a press release, viewing a branded style guide, reviewing a website mockup, requesting approval from a colleague, or starting an automated marketing campaign - it can all be done within the one platform, HIVO.


HIVO differentiates itself from competitors by focusing on developing easy to learn and use, design-led and automated user experiences.


Teams that use HIVO:

  • Improve communication amongst your team and partners;

47710.tagline: HIVO is a digital asset management (DAM) platform in a secured cloud environment.

plugins.name: Bulk replacement of text
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to instantly update your table designs by copying and pasting values from spreadsheet applications like Excel or Google Sheets.


The table design can be used whether it is a component or not!


With built-in conditional text formatting, you can automatically apply color rules to your text - for example, displaying positive values in green and negative values in red.

(You can also specify UI library color variables)
plugins.tagline: Bulk rewrite text in your table design.

132561.name: Bulk replacement of text
132561.description:

(You can also specify UI library color variables)
132561.release_notes: Added delimiter selection between tab and comma.
132561.tagline: Bulk rewrite text in your table design.

plugins.name: Brand book builder (by Blursday)
plugins.description:
The Brand Book Generator enables startup teams to create and manage their brand guidelines quickly and easily. It allows team admins to build and modify their brand books, capturing essential details about their brand's identity, aesthetics, and mission. The tool uses AI to analyze user input and generate a comprehensive brand book, complete with communication guidelines, color palettes, typography, and visual styles.


NOTE: The tool does not generate any graphics (yet)
plugins.tagline: AI brand book builder

plugins.name: Jokes Generator
plugins.description: "Jokes Generator" is the ultimate solution for injecting instant humor into your corporate presentations and breaking the monotony of boring charts. With a simple and user-friendly interface, this app provides a quick and efficient way to find short, witty jokes on the fly. Elevate your presentations with a touch of laughter, making your meetings more engaging and enjoyable. The "Jokes Generator" is your go-to source for a diverse range of punchlines, ensuring that you always have the perfect joke to lighten the mood and bring a smile to your audience. Transform mundane moments into memorable ones with "Jokes Generator"!
plugins.tagline: "Inject humor into presentations with 'Jokes Generator' for corporate charm!"

plugins.name: onecopy
plugins.description: Introducing onecopy, a Figma plugin that harnesses the capabilities of ChatGPT to simplify your design process. Use it to generate custom placeholder text, spur creativity, and boost productivity during design creation. Use oneCopy to paraphrase, translate or create variants of your text. Its capabilities are only limited by your imagination. Not only does it fill your mockups but also adds context and value, empowering your designs with the spark they need.
plugins.tagline: Elevate your work with ChatGPT

Use it to generate custom placeholder text, spur creativity, and boost productivity during design creation. Use oneCopy to paraphrase, translate or create variants of your text. Its capabilities are only limited by your imagination. Not only does it fill your mockups but also adds context and value, empowering your designs with the spark they need.

plugins.name: Rename Today
plugins.description: The Date Updater plugin allows you to easily and swiftly rename selected frames by either replacing or appending today's date in the format YYMMDD. Whether you're working on daily design drafts or just need to version your designs by date, this plugin simplifies the process and enhances your workflow. Just select the frames and click "Change" to update!
plugins.tagline: Automatically update frame names with today's date.

67189.name: Rename Today
67189.description: The Date Updater plugin allows you to easily and swiftly rename selected frames by either replacing or appending today's date in the format YYMMDD. Whether you're working on daily design drafts or just need to version your designs by date, this plugin simplifies the process and enhances your workflow. Just select the frames and click "Change" to update!
67189.release_notes:
Rename Today - Version 2.0 Release Notes

1. Enhanced Date Selection - Introduced a new date picker that allows users to select any date for renaming frames, not just today's date.
2. Redesigned UI - Updated the user interface with a cleaner and more modern design, improving user experience.
3. Localized Button Label - Depending on the region, the button label changes to provide a more localized feel.
4. Bug Fixes - Addressed issues from the previous version to ensure smoother performance.
67189.tagline: Automatically update frame names with today's date.

plugins.name: File Organizer
plugins.description:
Streamlined Organization:

Tired of manually creating pages for different project types? Say goodbye to the hassle! File Organizer automates the process, categorizing your Figma files into dedicated pages based on project types such as Sprint files and Design system files.


Tailored for Designers:

Created by designers, for designers, this plugin understands the unique needs of creative professionals. It not only simplifies file organization but also enhances collaboration by providing an intuitive structure that resonates with design workflows.


Universal Compatibility:

Whether you're a solo designer or part of a collaborative team, File Organizer seamlessly integrates into your Figma environment. Compatible with a wide range of project scales and complexities, this plugin adapts to your unique needs, ensuring a frictionless experience for all users.


Boost Productivity:

By automating the task of file organization, File Organizer empowers you to focus on what you do best designing! Spend less time navigating through cluttered files and more time bringing your creative visions to life.


Easy to Use:

No steep learning curves here! File Organizer boasts a user-friendly interface, making it accessible to both Figma beginners and seasoned professionals. With just a few clicks, watch as your Figma workspace transforms into a well-organized haven.


Elevate Collaboration:

Enhance collaboration within your team by ensuring everyone is on the same pageliterally! With File Organizer, project-specific files are consolidated, fostering a collaborative environment where communication and creativity can thrive.


How to Get Started:

Install File Organizer from the Figma Community.

Select the files you want to organize.

Run the plugin and let the magic happen!


Take the leap into a more organized and efficient Figma experience with File Organizer. Install now and watch as your design process becomes a breeze!
plugins.tagline: Organize Pages by Context or AI, and Auto-Fill Placeholders with AI

plugins.name: Mock Builder
plugins.description:
This is a beta release, and may contain minor bugs. Please report any bugs or feature requests to GitHub.


Mock Builder fills a large gap that other fake-data plugins have. Many plugins give you the option for inserting just one data type, which means that doing things like 'Lastname, Firstname' in the same text node impossible. Another example is one plugin may format phone numbers one way, or may output multiple types of formats. Neither of these may work how you want.


Mock Builder allows you to format your data how you want, using multiple types of dynamic fake data in the same text node along with static text.


Mock Builder data uses the falso.js library under the hood.
plugins.tagline: Quickly Build Fake Data, Endless Combinations

60429.name: Mock Builder
60429.description:
This is a beta release, and may contain minor bugs. Please report any bugs or feature requests to GitHub.


Mock Builder fills a large gap that other fake-data plugins have. Many plugins give you the option for inserting just one data type, which means that doing things like 'Lastname, Firstname' in the same text node impossible. Another example is one plugin may format phone numbers one way, or may output multiple types of formats. Neither of these may work how you want.


Mock Builder allows you to format your data how you want, using multiple types of dynamic fake data in the same text node along with static text.


Mock Builder data uses the falso.js library under the hood.

networkAccess.reasoning: Mock Builder requires an external script for retrieving fake data.

60429.tagline: Quickly Build Fake Data, Endless Combinations

plugins.name: DATAtoTable
plugins.description:
Data to Table


Data to Table Plugin is designed to streamline the workflow of designers and developers by allowing them to visualize and analyze JSON and XML data directly within the Figma interface.


With this plugin, you can easily convert structured data into organized tables,


making it convenient for front-end (F) and back-end (B) developers to collaborate effectively on projects.


and back-end (B) developers to analyze and work with data directly within Figma.



Key Features


Data Visualization

  1. Input your JSON or XML data, and the plugin will generate a structured table within Figma, providing a visual representation of your data.
  2. Child Objects are created in a separate table positioned at the bottom right of their parent Object.
  3. This allows for an intuitive representation of nested data structures.
  4. Sibling Objects are created at the same depth, visually representing data structures at the same hierarchical level.
  5. This makes it easy for designers to incorporate data-driven elements into their designs.


Data Analysis

  1. Developers (B-E) can utilize the generated tables to analyze and understand the underlying data structure.
  2. This feature simplifies the process of extracting key information from complex data sets.


Source Data View

  1. Clicking on the generated table allows you to access the raw source data directly within Figma.
  2. This makes it effortless for developers to inspect and work with JSON, XML, and other data formats, enhancing collaboration between design and development teams.


How It Works


  1. Input JSON or XML Data
  2. Click the "Generate Table" button
  3. Click the table and use the "View Data" button



Collaboration Made Easy


Data to Table Plugin bridges the gap between design and development by providing a seamless way to visualize, analyze, and work with data.


It empowers designers to incorporate real data into their designs and enables developers to gain insights from the design files.


This collaborative approach enhances the overall project workflow and communication between design and development teams.
plugins.tagline: JSON,XML to Table Frame

plugins.name: Text Find Replace
plugins.description:
Find & Replace Plugin for Figma

Effortlessly streamline your design workflow with the Find & Replace plugin for Figma. This intuitive tool allows you to quickly identify and modify selected text layers across your design, enhancing your efficiency and ensuring consistency in your typography.


Key Features:


User-Friendly Interface: Easily navigate through the plugin with a clean and straightforward layout. Enter the text you want to find and the text you wish to replace it with in just a few clicks.


Dynamic Text Highlighting: As you type in the "Find" field, matching text within the selected layers is instantly highlighted, providing a clear visual cue to help you confirm your selection before making any changes.


Preview of Changes: View a live preview of selected text, with matching words bolded and replaced text shown next to them. This feature allows you to visualize changes before applying them, ensuring you achieve the desired outcome.


Bulk Replacement: Replace multiple instances of text across various layers simultaneously, saving you time and effort. Whether it's a single word or a phrase, you can modify your design's language with ease.


Instant Feedback: Receive notifications upon completion of text replacements, ensuring youre informed of the changes made.


Cancel Option: If you change your mind, simply hit the cancel button to revert any unsaved changes, giving you peace of mind as you work.


With the Find & Replace plugin, enhance your design process by eliminating tedious text editing tasks and maintaining uniformity in your projects. Try it today and experience the difference in your Figma workflow!


Icon Credits :

<a href="https://www.flaticon.com/free-icons/search" title="search icons">Search icons created by Dimitry Miroliubov - Flaticon</a>
plugins.tagline: find and replace selected text easily

plugins.name: Apply Scrim Overlay
plugins.description:
This plugin help designing user interface where the entire screen darkens, and another component (e.g. dialog) overlays on top.


Select a frame and run the plugin. All objects in the frame will be grouped as a locked frame named 'BASE'. A locked rectangle named 'SCRIM' will be added to the frame.


If there's a Color style named 'Scrim' in the Local styles, a rectangle with that style will be added.
plugins.tagline: Add a rectangle to the top layer within the selected frame.

66727.name: Apply Scrim Overlay
66727.description:
This plugin help designing user interface where the entire screen darkens, and another component (e.g. dialog) overlays on top.


Select a frame and run the plugin. All objects in the frame will be grouped as a locked frame named 'BASE'. A locked rectangle named 'SCRIM' will be added to the frame.


If there's a Color style named 'Scrim' in the Local styles, a rectangle with that style will be added.
66727.tagline: Add a rectangle to the top layer within the selected frame.

plugins.name: Color Ramp Generator
plugins.description:
Introducing the Color Ramp Generator plugin - designed to streamline your workflow and ensure accessibility across all your designs. This tool allows you to generate a color ramp from any HEX color you provide, ensuring each color meets predefined contrast ratios for accessibility.


Simply enter your HEX code (with or without the #), give it a name and the plugin will automatically generate a 15-color gradient. It adjusts the lightness to meet the exact contrast ratios, while preserving the hue and saturation of your colors.


This color system integrates accessibility directly into your design process. In my past projects, clients often provided incomplete brand guidelines, especially regarding accessibility. To solve this, I created a method to generate accessible color ramps, assigning each shade a number for easy reference. I specifically built this system to support white-labeling requirements, enabling quick and easy customization for different brands while maintaining accessibility standards.


Each color in the palette is numbered from 5 to 100, with the darkest color assigned 5 and the brightest color assigned 100.


Heres the key feature: a points-based color system.

A 40-point difference between shades meets a 3:1 contrast ratio.

A 50-point difference meets a 4.5:1 ratio.

A 60-point difference meets a 7:1 ratio.


This system allows you to easily achieve AA and AAA accessibility standards by assigning colors to objects accordingly.


Cross-Palette Accessibility: This feature ensures that colors from different palettes are also accessible when combined. For example, Color 30 from one palette and Color 80 from another palette will automatically have a 50-point difference, which meets the 4.5:1 contrast ratio requirement. This makes it easy to mix colors from different palettes while maintaining accessibility.


The output generated is clean and ready for use in your design system, ensuring that your designs not only meet accessibility standards but also look polished and professional.


With this system, you can reduce your toolkit setup time from days to under a minute, saving 99% of the time.
plugins.tagline: Create color shades to establish a color system.

This color system integrates accessibility directly into your design process. In my past projects, clients often provided incomplete brand guidelines, especially regarding accessibility. I specifically built this system to support white-labeling requirements, enabling quick and easy customization for different brands while maintaining accessibility standards.

plugins.name: MATE
plugins.description:
Automate boring tasks

Tell MATE to rename variables with real smartness, apply random opacity for selected items, pick 3 items from the selection, etc, etc. MATE supports you in your daily, time-consuming tasks.


Your own little tools

With MATE you can create your own little tools that are not available as plugins.


Generative (randomized) Design

plugins.name: Documentation Link Bulk Edit
plugins.description:
Maintaining your design system has now become easier with the assistance of this super handy plugin. No longer do you need to edit the documentation link for each component individually.


Instructions

  • Select all the components or components sets you wish to edit the documentation link.
  • Paste the documentation link and click Update Link.
  • If you wish to clear/remove the documentation links, simply leave the input field empty and click Update Link.
  • Ensure you only select main components or component sets; component instances won't work.


How to reach out and support

Please send comments and suggestions to rodrigodaudskeff@gmail.com or simply post a comment here.
plugins.tagline: Easily edit the documentation link of multiple components with a single click.

How to reach out and support

Please send comments and suggestions to rodrigodaudskeff@gmail.com or simply post a comment here.
72428.release_notes: Fixed the issue of removing the documentation link for multiple components inside a component set.
72428.tagline: Easily edit the documentation link of multiple components with a single click.

plugins.name: Local Styler
plugins.description:
Local Styler is the must-have Figma plugin that simplifies your workflow by automating the creation of local styles. Whether youre working on color palettes, font hierarchies, effects, or grid systems, Local Styler transforms your design process with just a single click. Its designed to help you achieve consistency, efficiency, and a professional look across all your Figma projects.


Why Choose Local Styler for Local Styles in Figma?

Local Styler is specifically crafted to optimize local styles in Figma, making your designs cohesive and your workflow seamless. Heres how it works:


1. Color Styles & Palette Generator

  1. Automatically generate color palettes, including tonal variations, neutral colors, and state styles (hover, active, disabled).
  2. Save all color configurations directly as local styles in Figma for quick access and reuse.
  3. Ensure your color choices remain consistent across different screens and components.


2. Font Hierarchy Builder

  1. Create a complete typography hierarchy, including H1, H2, P1, and more.
  2. Define your preferred font, weight, and sizes, and have Local Styler save them as local styles.
  3. Achieve professional typography without manual adjustments every time.


3. Effect Creation

  1. Add depth and polish to your designs with ready-made shadow effects and blur effects.
  2. Save these effects as reusable local styles to maintain consistency in your design system.
  3. Experiment with various styles quickly and efficiently without repetitive setups.


4. Grid System Setup

  1. Automate the creation of grid systems for desktop, tablet, and mobile layouts.
  2. Save all grid configurations as local styles, ensuring responsive and precise designs.
  3. Spend less time on alignment and more on creativity.

accepted.name: Kaan Kiziltug
accepted.description: I'm Kaan Kzltu, a passionate and creative designer with a focus on bringing innovative ideas to life. I'm also behind the Local Styler plugin.

plugins.tagline: Generate color palettes, typography, effects, and grids as local stylesinstantly!

2. Font Hierarchy Builder

128234.release_notes:
-Add to variables feature added
Now users can automatically add the colours they specify to both local styles and local variables.

-Can be exported as tokens. 
Users can export design tokens in JSON, SCSS, Tailwind, JS/TS formats.

-The interface has been renewed.
With a more modern interface, the selected colour can be seen simultaneously with its shades.
Up to 5 colours can be added.

-Font search feature
font search input has been improved and works better

-Fonts are now added as Display, Headline, Body and Label.
This change was made for ease of use. Also H1, H2 versions will come in the next update.

Performance improvements.
128234.tagline: Generate color palettes, typography, effects, and grids as local stylesinstantly!

plugins.name: DSekon Auto Arrange
plugins.description:
The plugin moves the elements to the next line AUTOMATICALLY.


  1.  Launch the plugin. The UI panel opens.
  2. Select a bunch of items.
  3. Use button + to create an adaptive auto layout.
  4. Change the frame width.
  5. The elements will be rearranged automatically (The elements will also be rebuilt when the elements inside the frame are changed, except for deletion).


IMPORTANT: To automatically rearranged the elements, the UI panel must be open.


The plugin has the ability to sort the elements inside the frame in alphabetical order.


DSekon.com

Donate
plugins.tagline: The plugin moves the elements to the next line AUTOMATICALLY.

plugins.name: Text node name to id
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you append the id of all the selected text nodes to their names. The format will then be: 'TextNode<node-id=node.id>'. This action is reversible.
The plugin also lets you export the selected text nodes to your clipboard. If you choose 'Advanced export', you can add any prefix to your node ids. The export action will copy the node ids in an YAML format. It will also add the color, font style, and text decoration to the node.characters. The resulted text will be easily usable in html files. The plugin also formats multiline texts.

7903.name: Text node name to id
7903.description:

The plugin also lets you export the selected text nodes to your clipboard. If you choose 'Advanced export', you can add any prefix to your node ids. The export action will copy the node ids in an YAML format. It will also add the color, font style, and text decoration to the node.characters. The resulted text will be easily usable in html files. The plugin also formats multiline texts.

plugins.name: Frame Name Organizer
plugins.description:
This is a plugin for changing frame names depending on the layout flow direction. It's helpful for those who doesnt like to see Frame 1, Frame 2, ..., Frame N in their design files


There are 4 types of auto-layout flows in Figma: Vertical layout, Horizontal layout, Wrapped layout and Without auto-layout


A replacement pattern is a regular expression for finding necessary frame names for renaming


The plugin allows to apply renaming:

  1. only to selected frames
  2. only to defined flow type of auto-layouts
  3. to all the page frames with any layouts

accepted.name: Elean
accepted.description: Hi! Im Elena, a product designer. I enjoy creating design systems and building UI kits

plugins.tagline: This is a plugin for changing frame names depending on the layout flow direction

98545.name: Frame Name Organizer

  2. only to defined flow type of auto-layouts
  3. to all the page frames with any layouts
98545.tagline: This is a plugin for changing frame names depending on the layout flow direction

plugins.name: Data Frame
plugins.description:
Data Frame automates mail merge in Figma by allowing you to import CSV data and automatically populate design templates with personalized content.


This plugin allows you to:

  1. Select multiple frames, groups, or component instances (as design template)
  2. Upload a CSV file containing your data
  3. Map CSV columns to text layers in your selected template
  4. Automatically generate multiple instances of your template, each populated from each row of data in the CSV file.


Example use:

  1. Business Cards: Create a sleek business card template and instantly generate cards for your entire team by importing employee details from a CSV file.
  2. Event Badges: Design a conference badge layout once, then use Data Frame to populate it with attendee information, creating unique badges for hundreds of participants in seconds.
  3. Order Packing Slips: Design a packing slip template and instantly generate customized slips for each order, complete with customer details, order numbers, and item lists from your e-commerce platform's CSV export.
  4. Personalized Email Designs: Design an email template in Figma and use Data Frame to visualize how it will look for different subscribers, importing names, account details, and custom offers from your CRM's CSV export.


Perfect for creating dynamic mockups, personalised designs, or at scale documents. Data Frame saves time and ensures accuracy when working with large datasets in your Figma projects.
plugins.tagline: Automate personalization by merging a design template with the .csv data source.

104354.name: Data Frame
104354.description:
Data Frame automates mail merge in Figma by allowing you to import CSV data and automatically populate design templates with personalized content.


This plugin allows you to:

  1. Select multiple frames, groups, or component instances (as design template)
  2. Upload a CSV file containing your data
  3. Map CSV columns to text layers in your selected template
  4. Automatically generate multiple instances of your template, each populated from each row of data in the CSV file.


Example use:

  1. Business Cards: Create a sleek business card template and instantly generate cards for your entire team by importing employee details from a CSV file.
  2. Event Badges: Design a conference badge layout once, then use Data Frame to populate it with attendee information, creating unique badges for hundreds of participants in seconds.
  3. Order Packing Slips: Design a packing slip template and instantly generate customized slips for each order, complete with customer details, order numbers, and item lists from your e-commerce platform's CSV export.
  4. Personalized Email Designs: Design an email template in Figma and use Data Frame to visualize how it will look for different subscribers, importing names, account details, and custom offers from your CRM's CSV export.


Perfect for creating dynamic mockups, personalised designs, or at scale documents. Data Frame saves time and ensures accuracy when working with large datasets in your Figma projects.
104354.release_notes:
- ENHANCEMENT: The system now supports comma(,) or semicolon(;) separators/delimiters in the .csv file.
- ENHANCEMENT: When a cell data is empty, the text layer which was defined to merge with, will be hidden.
- ENHANCEMENT: Updated labels for better understanding of the steps, limitations and capabilities.
104354.tagline: Automate personalization by merging a design template with the .csv data source.

plugins.name: Text Extractor Pro
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows you to easily extract text from selected frames and copy it to your clipboard. Its perfect for designers who need to quickly gather text content from their designs.


Features Introduction

Extracts text from multiple selected frames

Automatically arranges text by frame order (left to right, top to bottom)

Option to copy extracted text to clipboard with one click

Handles hidden text layers and notifies if no text is found


How to Use

1.Select one or more frames in your Figma design.

2.Click the Get Text Layers button to extract text from the selected frames.

3.The extracted text will be displayed in the result area.

4.If text is found, the Copy to Clipboard button will appear. Click it to copy the text.

5.If no text is found or if an error occurs, you will receive a notification.


Notes

Ensure that your frames contain visible text layers for successful extraction.

The plugin will notify you if no text layers are found or if the selection is invalid.



Figma



1. Figma

2.

3.

4.

5.

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution.

plugins.tagline: Effortlessly extract and copy text from selected frames

2: You can extract the svg data of the selected node

3: You can convert the path in the selected node's svg data to Android svg xml
